page.description: GetWebSite retrieves the properties of a web site.
page.prototype: .GetWebSite as L (BYREF WebSite as P, WebSiteName as C)

argument.name: BYREF WebSite
argument.description: The variable into which the web site object is to be returned.

argument.name: WebSiteName
argument.description: The name of the web site to retrieve.

return.name: result
return.description: Returns .t. if the function call succeeded and .f. if it failed. Look at the CallResult property to determine the cause of a failure.
